name: The Vessel of Vodyanoy
description:
Game download link (1.74G): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZnJtLpH-AVxTw9O-yeSTZD0SxKJnMOzI/view?usp=shari...https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NJnGTjevGDM

You suddenly fainted while walking down the street at night. When you wake up, you find you are in a different unfamiliar place. There is a feeling of the room shaking and hearing the sea waves roar. You feel so weird, but you have to find a way to get out of here. In the escape process, you found the secret hidden behind this place.
